articles.author: Laura Ungar, Michelle R. Smith
articles.title: How huge health funding cuts in Washington ‘put lives at risk’ in communities - AP News
articles.description: Americans are losing an array of people and programs dedicated to keeping them healthy. State and local health departments responsible for invisible but critical work including inspecting restaurants, monitoring wastewater for new and harmful germs, respondin…
articles.content: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) Americans are losing a vast array of people and programs dedicated to keeping them healthy. Gone are specialists who were confronting a measles outbreak in Ohio, workers who drov… [+13401 chars]
